required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Pilot Study of Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy With or Without Camrelizumab for Locally Advanced Gastric Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Pilot Study of Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy With or Without Camrelizumab for Locally Advanced Gastric Cancer: a Single-center, Open-label, Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: It is a single-center, open-lable, randomized controlled trial to prospectively investigate the effectiveness and safety of Camrelizumab combined with DOS regimen chemotherapy in neoadjuvant treatment of patients with locally advanced gastric cancer.

primary_outcome.description: complete or subtotal regression (<10% residual tumor per tumor bed)

secondary_outcome.description: complete regression (no residual tumor per tumor bed)
surgically removed tissue without residual cancer cells
the time from the start of randomization to death due to any cause.
the time from the start of randomization to the incurable resection, local recurrence or metastasis, or death from any cause.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: the time from the start of randomization to 3 months after surgery

intervention.description: camrelizumab 200mg，ivdrip，q3w； albumin nanoparticle of paclitaxel 260 mg/m2、 ivdrip，d1，q3w； oxaliplatine 85mg/m2、ivdrip，d1，q3w； S-1 40 mg/m2，po, bid，d1~d14，q3w. 3 cycles.
albumin nanoparticle of paclitaxel 260 mg/m2、 ivdrip，d1，q3w； oxaliplatine 85mg/m2、ivdrip，d1，q3w； S-1 40 mg/m2，po, bid，d1~d14，q3w. 3 cycles.
